Service Details: - Promotes and enhances West Kelowna and Peachland seniors’ wellness through volunteerism, educational programs, referral, and social programs- Provides education information and opportunities on health and social issues that include Medwatch, Better at Home, Computer and other Device Tutorials and Assistance, Happy Hookers needlework group, Take-A-Break Library presentations, and the twice per week Walk 'N' Talk- Services include Visitation Program, Transportation Program and Grocery Shopping Program
Meetings: Volunteer support meetings scheduled to provided additional education and information for volunteers
Address & Map: 2300 Carrington Rd, #160West Kelowna, BC     V4T 2N6View MapQuest Map
